ingredients.content: 1 oz dried shiitake mushrooms, sliced in halves
16 oz Chinese cabbage leaves, cut into pieces (1 in.)

preparations.content: Place a bowl onto mixing bowl lid and weigh in mushrooms. Add hot water to mushrooms, set aside and allow to soak (approx. 20 min.) before draining. Place garlic and oil into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula. Add shrimp and drained mushrooms and sauté <b>5 min/250°F/speed 0.5<b>.
Add cabbage, carrots, salt and pepper, push down vegetables with spatula and cook <b>8 min/212°F//speed <b>.
In a small bowl mix rice flour and water to create a slurry. Add prepared slurry into mixing bowl and cook <b>1 min/212°F//speed <b>. Serve hot with a drizzle of sesame oil.
